pageTitle: Bent steel rod - by mnorusis @ LumberJocks.com ~ woodworking community
textBeforeTable: Show all forums View all topics Start new topic signed in to reply. You must be Have your say... Merchant grade steel bars (the ones found in big box stores), are not good enough quality to bend without breaking. Dependind on how sharp a bend, you can heat it up before bending. Hot rolled steel (black) rods will bend better than cold rolled steel (shiny) rods. #12 posted 10-18-2012 09:15 PM 3349 posts in 2214 days home | projects | blog MrRon -- Bondo Gaposis Heat it w/ MAP gas until cherry red, put in a mechanics vise and bend away. Easy. #11 posted 10-17-2012 11:40 PM 3251 posts in 1322 days
